text: â€œNdipo ndi udindo wa Allah kusonyeza njira yolungama (yomwe ingakufikitseni ku Munda wamtendere), koma zilipo njira zina zokhota (zomwe sizifikitsa ku choonadi). Ndipo Allah akadafuna, akadakuongolani nonsenu (mwa chifuniro chanu ndi mopanda chifuniro chanu. Koma Iye adakupatsani nzeru kuti musankhe nokha njira imene mufuna)
